achievements.label: In the Isle's Shadow
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I found my way through the storm to Brancrug Village.

achievements.label: Exit Dewulf
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I restored the sanctuary of the last Baron Dewulf.

achievements.label: The Curia of the Isle
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I restored the rooms set aside by the Curia for the Librarian.

achievements.label: The Brothers and Sisters of St Brandan's
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I restored the Abbey Church of the Isle, all the way to its topmost spire.

achievements.label: Darkness at Noon
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I restored the deepest chambers of the Cucurbit Prison.

achievements.label: Beneath the Abbey of the Black Dove
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I unearthed the final secret of the caves below Hush House.

achievements.label: Mastery: Birdsong
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of music, riddles and miscellanea.

achievements.label: Mastery: Bosk
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of the primaeval wood.

achievements.label: Mastery: Horomachistry
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of the laws (and disagreements) of the Hours.

achievements.label: Mastery: Hushery
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of silence and its sundering.

achievements.label: Mastery: Illumination
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of purification of the self and its surroundings.

achievements.label: Mastery: Ithastry
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of alchemy, metallurgy and pyrotechnics.

achievements.label: Mastery: Nyctodromy
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of the ways and byways of the transmundane.

achievements.label: Mastery: Preservation
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of healing and restoration.

achievements.label: Mastery: Skolekosophy
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I mastered the Wisdom of things that should not be studied.
